title: Parachute's DIN series
content:
Hello Everyone,

I am wondering if anyone out there has experience using fonts from Parahcute's DIN series. I am unfamiliar with the foundry and would like to set my C.V. for a design professorship using DIN Display, mainly, but may jump over to their DIN Text if DIN Display doesn't work out at lower sizes as they claim it will. Before I lay down the Euros, I'd love to know how well these fonts behave. Are they well-spaced and well-kerned?
author: jilljill

comments.content: I do not own Din Display but have the specimen PDF which seems to work quite will over a variety of sizes. It is a nice Din with a very good feel.
